roleset.name: changeable, dynamic
roleset.note: FLUID-J NOTES: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01, parts 2,3. Framed by Claire. (from fluid.01-j)

example.name: Single argument
example.text: The scene is very " fluid " at the moment .

roleset.name: characteristic of fluid, graceful
roleset.note: FLUID-J NOTES: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01, parts 2,3. Framed by Claire. (from fluid.02-j)

example.name: Dancer
example.text: The ballerina's movements were both fluid and cat-like.

roleset.name: easily convertible to cash
roleset.note: FLUID-J NOTES: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01, parts 2,3. Framed by Claire. (from fluid.03-j)

role.descr: asset, or sometimes metonymically asset owner

example.name: Single argument
example.text: Do we know how much of his assets are fluid and how much is tied down?
